name: ebeddedapi
description: Scritps to deploy on ftp server

scripts.deploy: cd .. && cd ./EmbeddedApp_Portal/ && ng build -c hml --output-path ../EbeddedApi/wwwroot && cd .. && cd ./EbeddedApi/ && dotnet publish && node deploy hml
scripts.deploy:stg: cd .. && cd ./EmbeddedApp_Portal/ && ng build -c stg --output-path ../EbeddedApi/wwwroot && cd .. && cd ./EbeddedApi/ && dotnet publish && node deploy stg
scripts.deploy:prd: cd .. && cd ./EmbeddedApp_Portal/ && ng build -c production --base-href / --output-path ../EbeddedApi/wwwroot && cd .. && cd ./EbeddedApi/ && dotnet publish && node deploy prd

author: Thiago Caldas
